<AlertDialog>
  <AlertDialogTrigger asChild>
    <Button variant="{{trigger_variant}}">{{trigger_label}}</Button>
  </AlertDialogTrigger>
  <AlertDialogContent>
    <AlertDialogHeader>
      <AlertDialogTitle>{{title}}</AlertDialogTitle>
      <AlertDialogDescription>
        {{description}}
      </AlertDialogDescription>
    </AlertDialogHeader>
    <AlertDialogFooter>
      <AlertDialogCancel>Cancel</AlertDialogCancel>
      <AlertDialogAction onClick={{{onConfirm}}}>{{confirm_label}}</AlertDialogAction>
    </AlertDialogFooter>
  </AlertDialogContent>
</AlertDialog>
